alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 4:55PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL NASSAU AND NORTH CENTRAL DUVAL COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM EDT... At 455 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ratliff, or 7 miles west of Jacksonville International Arpt, moving east at 5 mph. Boundary collisions will likely strengthen storms. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville International Arpt, Ratliff, Cisco Gardens, Nassau Village-Ratliff, and Tallyrand. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval
